content: bernie mitten based of the mitten made for bernie sanders by jen ellis as worn at the biden inauguration / \ / \ 51 this mitten pattern has not been tested tech edited or otherwise / \ / \ 50 proofed i haven t even knit them myself yet so i have no idea how / \ / \ 49 they ll turn out / \ / \ 48 / \ / \ 47 46 the pattern is based on a traditional norwegian-style selbu mitten with 45 some alterations to the classic shape 44 43 recommended gauge 18st over 4in/10cm size can be adjusted by 42 changing gauge use larger needles for a bigger size mitten i 41 40 recommend you knit the cuff in 2x2 rib on needles 1 size smaller than 39 gauge needles to add length i recommend adding extra row of mc 38 after row 30 and 38 37 36 35 basic instructions cast on 32st and join in the round work 12 row or 34 desired cuff length in 2x2 rib begin colorwork chart with mc at row 13 33 passing over greyed over greyed out stitches increase as written for 32 thumb gusset using m1r/m1l or increase of choice on row 26 place 31 worked thumb stitches marked with red line on hold and cast on 9 30 29 stitches to continue working remainder of chart decrease using 28 ssk/k2tog as written to finish break yarn and pull through remaining 27 stitches and pull tight 26 for thumb place held stitches on needle and pick up 11 stitches one 25 in each corner and 9 across cast on stitches 20 st total join in the 24 m1 m1 23 round and work thumb chart as written 22 weave in ends and block 21 m1 m1 20 to knit the second mitten work the chart in reverse reading left to 19 18 right m1 m1 17 16 thumb chart 16 15 15 14 / \ / \ 14 m1 m1 13 / \ / \ 13 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 12 / \ / \ 12 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 11 11 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 10 10 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 9 9 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 8 8 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 7 7 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 6 6 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 5 5 - - - - - - - - - - -
